user.description: Please enter the path and the cookie data. Further information available at https://github.com/KoljaWindeler/ytube_music_player

data.name: Name for the entity (without 'media_player' prefix)
data.cookie: Enter cookie text, copied from browser
data.speakers: Enter the entity_id of your default ouput player e.g. media_player.google_mini
data.brand_id: Enter a brand id if you are using a brand account
data.header_path: File path for the header file

finish.description: Here you can change to entity ids of select fields, if you don't use the dropdowns just leave them as is

data.select_speakers: Entity id of input_select for speaker selection
data.select_playmode: Entity id of input_select for playmode selection
data.select_source: Entity id of input_select for playlist/radio selection
data.select_playlist: Entity id of input_select for playlist selection
data.select_playcontinuous: Entity id of input_boolean for play continouus selection
data.proxy_path: Path for proxy mode, leave blank if you don't need it
data.proxy_url: Path for proxy mode, leave blank if you don't need it

error.error_generic: Something with your cookie wasn't right. Format and fields are ok but the login failed
error.error_auth_user: Can't find the 'X-Goog-AuthUser' field, please check your input
error.error_cookie: Can't find the 'Cookie' field, please check your input
